dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Have you talked to Sebastian yet? What did he say?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: He said he'll go on a date with you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: What do you see in this guy?

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Okay, but how did he say it? Did he sound excited? Or like he was just agreeing to it?

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Was he like, "Yay, a date with Celia, I've secretly been waiting for this!" Or was it more, "Sure, I don't have anything else going on..."

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: He likes you, Celia. Just don't ask him for any discounts.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Look, you've got your chance. Have fun and don't overthink it.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: All I know is that if you act this crazy, you'll send him running.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Not to worry! If I never buy another raptidon tongue, it'll be too soon.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Ah, look at me going on. I'm sure you've got other things to do. And Mr. Nandi's giving me that back-to-work look.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Anyhow, thank you!

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh, I will! Now, I've just got to figure out which jumpsuit I'm wearing. And how I'm fixing my hair. Or maybe I should go with a casual look...

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Right. I've just got to be myself. Just my normal self...

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: He doesn't talk much, but he's got this... quiet intensity, you know? Like there's stuff going on inside his head that you have no idea about.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Plus, he's got great legs. It's hard to find a man who doesn't skimp on lower body exercises.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You really want to be with someone you can't talk to?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There are other fish in the sea, Celia.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's... all I need to know.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: You think that's what I'm looking for? Aw, you're funny.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Not in Stellar Bay! Everyone else who isn't taken either smells like saltuna or they're my boss.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Besides, a man with a good smile and a proportionate upper-to-lower body ratio isn't something to pass up.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: Sorry, sometimes I get carried away.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll talk to you later.
